title: Table 19: Observation of TLM (Teaching Learning Materials) in classrooms. 2024

title: Table 20: Trends over time
description: Trends in the availability and usability of school facilities in Bihar from 2010 to 2024. Covers mid-day meals, drinking water, toilets (including separate girls' toilets), libraries, electricity, and computers.
data: | Mid-day meal | Mid-day meal served in school on the day of visit | 57.2 | 84.5 | 86.8 | 92.9 |
| Mid-day meal | Kitchen/shed for cooking mid-day meal | 64.0 | 91.6 | 86.4 | 81.1 |
| Drinking water | No facility for drinking water | 9.6 | 3.5 | 4.8 | 3.4 |
| Drinking water | Facility but no drinking water available | 11.7 | 6.8 | 7.9 | 7.9 |
| Toilet | Facility but toilet not useable | 47.2 | 21.1 | 26.5 | 15.4 |
| Girls' toilet | No separate provision for girls' toilet | 49.9 | 16.7 | 11.3 | 11.5 |
| Girls' toilet | Separate provision but locked | 15.1 | 9.1 | 6.5 | 3.3 |
| Girls' toilet | Separate provision, unlocked but not useable | 16.9 | 11.2 | 18.5 | 11.6 |
| Girls' toilet | Separate provision, unlocked and useable | 18.1 | 63.0 | 63.8 | 73.6 |
| Library | Library but no books being used by children on the day of visit | 24.7 | 31.6 | 30.6 | 24.4 |
| Library | Library books being used by children on the day of visit | 28.2 | 27.5 | 35.4 | 43.5 |
| Electricity | Of schools with electricity connection, % schools with electricity available on the day of visit |  | 71.4 | 84.7 | 91.6 |
| Computer | No computer available for children to use | 93.1 | 96.6 | 92.4 | 83.5 |
| Computer | Computer available but not being used by children on the day of visit | 2.9 | 2.8 | 6.1 | 7.2 |
| Computer | Computer being used by children on the day of visit | 4.0 | 0.6 | 1.5 | 9.4 |

title: Table 21: Foundational Literacy and Numeracy (FLN) activities. 2024
description: Implementation status of Foundational Literacy and Numeracy (FLN) initiatives in primary and upper primary schools in Bihar for the 2023-24 and 2024-25 academic years. Details include government directives, teacher training, and provision of materials and funds.
data: | % Schools | % Schools | Received a directive from govt to implement FLN activities with Std I-II/III | At least one teacher received training on FLN | At least one teacher received training on FLN | Received Teaching Learning Materials (TLM) for FLN activities** | Received funds for TLM for FLN activities** | School Readiness Programme held for Std l |

| Current academic year (2024-2025) | Upper primary schools* | 90.2 | 93.2 | 61.1 | 77.3 | 13.6 | 64.4 |
